content.title: Publish the App
content.body:
1. For the Post Build Action, from the drop-down list, select Publish to my App Store.
  2. Under Mobile, select the checkbox for Android.
    Ensure that you have unselected the checkboxes for all the other platforms and channels.
  3. For the Build Mode, from the drop-down list, select Debug.
  4. Click Build.
    It may take some time for Iris to build the app.
    After the app is published, the Your App is ready window appears.
